page.title: 03RECREATION-GAMES-PLAY-TEAMS
page.content: At school we play football,netball,rounders and non-stop cricket in teams.At playtimes we play lots of games usually in small groups.Here is a list of some of our favourite games:- Sand,Sea,Shore--racing between three places. Blockey--a type of hide and seek. Please Mr.Crocodile--cross the "river" without being caught. Hop Scotch--hopping in and out of a design of squares drawn on the ground. Polo--guess a subject then run against your apponant. Clock Works--one person swings others round,then they freeze in a certain position.Then they move in a jerky fashion until told to stop.
